beats.text: ‘‘Great, we found a new page! Let’s see… ‘There… That person!’ |VS| alerted $hero_name |VS| ‘Just across $avatar_street street …walking fast. Do you see? People walk like a wolf with no pack: Heads down, eyes on their glassy, shiny, metallic rectangles,’ |VS| said $hero_name, before talking again…

‘And look at that! It is a $avatar_amenity. People come, look at it, and go, in and around it, but they never stop moving. The Man-Village is full of magic that feeds the eye!’ |VS| After a quiet pause, $hero_name scratches their head and said…
‘Bah! They are too distracted! A tiger could walk right behind them, and they wouldn't know until the teeth snapped, |VS| as they continued walking.’
‘We have seen enough. Let them rush. We take our time. Let's find a quieter path to the next page,’ |VS| suggests $hero_name, waiting for your next move.
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 2  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
